titulo: 365 Days of Spanish Expressions and Idioms
descripcion:
Spanish idioms to add depth to your conversations and help you sound like a native speaker.
Recommended for Spanish-learners of all levels, this audiobook is the perfect supplement to your Spanish language lessons. You'll get a daily dose of Spanish figurative speech, colloquial expressions, and idioms.

Entertaining and full of insights:
Expressions are not only fun to learn in small doses every day; they also provide interesting insights into how Spanish and Latin Americans think. By understanding Spanish expressions and their corresponding translations, you'll gain a clearer grasp of the Spanish and Latin American culture and point of view.
Clear meanings and examples:
Each expression is broken down for you with its literal translation in English, what it actually means, and an example of how it can be used in a sentence.
Never forget useful expressions:
At the end of each chapter/week, you will find a recap and a quiz to truly make the expressions stick. Memorizing Spanish idioms and expressions has never been this easy and fun!
